### Example
```{r sampleplot, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
plot(smpldf$annual..sale.in.mil,smpldf$size.in.sqft.thous)
abline(lm(smpldf$size.in.sqft.thous ~ smpldf$annual..sale.in.mil))
```

### HW Plot
```{r plothw, echo=TRUE, include=TRUE}

abline(lm(tmrev$Value ~ tmrev$Revenue))
```
